name: LaserTank Graphics File
summary: Learn about .LTG files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Some LTG files can be found in the LaserTank installation directory. Others can be downloaded from the LaserTank website.

NOTE: You can change the graphics used in LaserTank by selecting Options â†’ Change Graphics ... from the game menu. Any LTG files in the LaserTank installation directory will be detected and populated into the list.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
